response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or operations. We understand the importance of this investment to you, and thus, we are offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you receive the best possible value while also allowing us to maintain a mutually beneficial relationship. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 750000}
